text:
Your Dad Could Go Golfing With Weekend Today’s Dylan Dreyer In Scotland — Here’s How!

You may recognize Dylan Dreyer as the weekend weather anchor for NBC News’ Weekend Today, but she’s also a new mom to her son Calvin. In fact, this Sunday’s Father’s Day…

http://ift.tt/2sEjhhi
